org.wonderly.jini.serviceui
Class PropertyDescriptorImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.beans.FeatureDescriptor
      org.wonderly.jini.serviceui.PropertyDescriptorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PropertyDescriptorImpl
extends FeatureDescriptor
implements Serializable

This class encapsulates the description of a property. Unfortunately, the FeatureDescriptor class has nothing but transient fields in it, and when you want to send them across the pond to the client, all the values disappear. So, this class subclasses FeatureDescriptor and restores Serializability of all the appropriate fields needed for this application.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregg Wonderly - gregg.wonderly@pobox.com
See Also:
